description: Basic interceptor. High evasion and speed. Unlocked at start.
Common striker interceptor. High damage and attack speed.
Uncommon scout interceptor. Stealth capabilities and high evasion.
Rare disruptor interceptor. Powerful EMP abilities with high energy capacity.
Basic fighter. Balanced stats with missile platform. Unlocked at start.
Common gunship fighter. Multiple projectiles and weapon slots.
Uncommon hunter fighter. High precision for anti-interceptor combat.
Uncommon guardian fighter. High survivability and defensive abilities.
Rare ranger fighter. Stealth capabilities with long range.
Rare strike leader fighter. Command abilities that buff nearby ships.
Common shield frigate. Heavy armor and shield restoration.
Common support frigate. High energy for shield projection abilities.
Uncommon shield frigate. Massive armor and area denial.
Uncommon corvette frigate. Heavy weapons platform with multiple weapon slots.
Epic flagship frigate. Command vessel with fleet coordination abilities.
Deploy with 2 missiles that launch every ten attacks.
Deploy with 1 homing missile that prioritizes stealth targets.
Windup weapon. Charges for 6s then rapid-fires down lane for 18s.
Defensive system. Reduces non-elemental damage in 1-square radius after 6s charge.
Adds laser damage to every auto-attack.
Adds lightning/shock damage to every auto-attack.
Start battles with double shields that decay to max shields over time.
